channel.title: My tribute to HL2; casemod CHARGE!
channel.description:
Hello HL friends,
It has been a while, but now it is done; I've finished my latest casemod creation, a tribute to Half-Life2. I have entered it in the big Coolermaster Casemod competition 2011. The competition there is more then serious, and very well performed cases are there to be seen. I hope you like what I have made this time. If you like my case, please follow this link and VOTE for me: Name Frenkie, Catagory Scratch build, Case CHARGE! BTW; did you know that YOU can win nice prizes when you vote? greetings and take care.
[url='https://casemod2011.coolermaster.com/']VOTE HERE[/url]
Frenk Janse The Netherlands. [url]https://www.casemodz.nl[/url]
[img]https://clan-rag.gameparty.net/bitchie/case/Charge/Charge_200.jpg[/img] [img]https://clan-rag.gameparty.net/bitchie/case/Charge/Charge_308.jpg[/img] [img]https://clan-rag.gameparty.net/bitchie/case/Charge/Charge_318.jpg[/img] [img]https://clan-rag.gameparty.net/bitchie/case/Charge/Charge_323.jpg[/img]

Sell it to Valve.

item.description:
Hello HL friends,

It has been a while, but now it is done; I’ve finished my latest casemod creation, a tribute to Half-Life2.
I have entered it in the big Coolermaster Casemod competition 2011.
The competition there is more then serious, and very well performed cases are there to be seen.
I hope you like what I have made this time.
If you like my case, please follow this link and VOTE for me: Name Frenkie, Catagory Scratch build, Case CHARGE!
BTW; did you know that YOU can win nice prizes when you vote?
greetings and take care.

VOTE HERE

Frenk Janse
The Netherlands.
https://www.casemodz.nl
